overview:
Shayon is a college junior (3rd year) majoring in Computer Science with minors in Information Science. Shayon, has previously started a startup but that did not go quite well. He does not mind saying he failed. But rather, he believes he has a learnt a lot out of it. And is now more focused and passionate about solving some real life problems in his next venture.

When not working or studying, Shayon enjoys watching movies and hanging out with people who are very close to his heart. Coming to sports, Shayon spends the time playing badminton. Lastly, he takes keen interest in startups and is currently working on one.
